text.section: A majority of the authorized membership of the State Board is a quorum.

section.section: The State Board shall meet at least once a month, at the times that it determines, in the office of the State Board.
The State Board may hold special meetings as necessary.

text.section:
Subject to the State budget, each member of the State Board is entitled to:
an annual salary of $3,600; and
reimbursement for reasonable expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations.
The State Board may employ a staff in accordance with the State budget.
